entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 12:24 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
